coreAtributes.name: Superhero Tights
coreAtributes.description: A pair of form-fitting tights made of highly durable material for battle general heroism.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your superhero tights.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s superhero tights and roughly pull it off [npc.her] legs.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your superhero tights and roughly pulls it off your legs.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s tights and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her] legs.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.legs] through their tights as you pull it onto [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull up [npc.her] tights.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces on your pants.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pull up [npc2.her] pants.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your superhero tights.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and roughly pull down [npc.her] superhero tights.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and roughly pulls down your superhero tights.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and roughly pulls down [npc2.her] superhero tights.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull up your superhero tights.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and roughly pull up [npc.her] superhero tights.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and roughly pulls up your superhero tights.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and roughly pulls up [npc2.her] superhero tights.
